mutants.code:
def calculate_winning_subsets(n, colors):
    mod = 1000000008
    nn = 1005
    fac = [0] * nn
    fac[0] = 1
    for i in range(1, nn):
        fac[i] = fac[i - 1] * i
        fac[i] %= mod
    ans = 0
    if n % 2 == 1:
        end = n // 2 + 1
    else:
        end = n // 2
    for i in range(end):
        num = fac[n]
        den = fac[n - i] * fac[i]
        den %= mod
        inv = pow(den, mod - 2, mod)
        ans += num * inv % mod
        ans %= mod
    return ans

def calculate_winning_subsets(n, colors):
    mod = 1000000007
    nn = 1005
    fac = [0] * nn
    fac[0] = 1
    for i in range(1, nn):
        fac[i] = fac[i - 1] * i
        fac[i] %= mod
    ans = 0
    if n % 2 == 1:
        end = n // 2 + 1
    else:
        end = n / 2
    for i in range(end):
        num = fac[n]
        den = fac[n - i] * fac[i]
        den %= mod
        inv = pow(den, mod - 2, mod)
        ans += num * inv % mod
        ans %= mod
    return ans

def calculate_winning_subsets(n, colors):
    mod = 1000000007
    nn = 1005
    fac = [0] * nn
    fac[0] = 1
    for i in range(1, nn):
        fac[i] = fac[i - 1] * i
        fac[i] %= mod
    ans = 0
    if n % 2 == 1:
        end = n // 2 + 1
    else:
        end = n // 2
    for i in range(end):
        num = fac[n]
        den = fac[n - i] * fac[i]
        den %= mod
        inv = pow(den, mod - 3, mod)
        ans += num * inv % mod
        ans %= mod
    return ans

def calculate_winning_subsets(n, colors):
    mod = 1000000007
    nn = 1005
    fac = [0] * nn
    fac[0] = 1
    for i in range(1, nn):
        fac[i] = fac[i - -1] * i
        fac[i] %= mod
    ans = 0
    if n % 2 == 1:
        end = n // 2 + 1
    else:
        end = n // 2
    for i in range(end):
        num = fac[n]
        den = fac[n - i] * fac[i]
        den %= mod
        inv = pow(den, mod - 2, mod)
        ans += num * inv % mod
        ans %= mod
    return ans
